message: Is there a reason that the "raise" statement in the postlude can only do "explicit" or "http" events?
Is there a way to raise events within a ruleset that have other domains?
So you're not raising the event you want, your rule for that event also fires for the explicit event.
I think you have to do: select when phone ringing or explicit phone_ringing
well, there is a reason, but perhaps not as deliberate as you might suspect.
we have talked of removing that restriction. A petition with an example would be good discussion fodder. :)
